Price.headerInfo1: Depending on the objectives and complexity of the project
Price.title1: For large-sized projects with many pages of the same type (catalog, blog, news site)
Price.title5: There are non-standard tasks for the site
Price.title6: If you want a web application
Price.title7: For medium-sized projects with similar pages (e.g., catalog or blog)
Price.title8: If there are specific requirements for CMS
Price.title10: Need to set up additional sales to goods, implement purchases '3 in 1'
Price.title12: For quick launch of small sites, stores, and landings
Price.title14: Ideal when you need a test of the industry
Price.title15: Suitable if you have a small budget
Price.description1: This is a site that consists of 1-3 blocks. Such a page is created for a separate product or service
Price.description2: A page for collecting leads or calling the user to a target action. For example, sign up for a webinar, consultation, or purchase a product
Price.description3: A site for selling products with a payment system, cart, delivery, and informing the seller about the order
Price.description4: A site with a more complex structure: several pages united by a menu or links on pages

Why.description1: We have payment for work, not for hours
Why.description2: Free corrections within 1 month after work
Why.description4: We select a beneficial solution for you

Info.descriptionLeft1: Customers come to us with a request:
Info.descriptionLeft2: «cheap landing» and «premium site» with non-standard, complex tasks
Info.descriptionRight1: We connect your business with the target audience, analyzing data and competitors, creating optimal solutions and project structure.
Info.descriptionRight2: We create a design for the future site, based on positioning and corporate style. If materials are missing, we offer our vision without increasing the budget.
Info.descriptionRight3: Before launching, we conduct a final debugging of the site, set up metrics and analytics to track user actions.
Info.descriptionRight4: We will prepare a video instruction on how to use the site or train your specialist.
Info.descriptionRight5: After launch, we maintain contact with you and discuss further project development plans.
Info.descriptionRight6: We collaborate with your marketers and advertising agents, or help find new ones. We quickly make changes and improvements. We support you in analytics and answer your questions.

Feedback.title: Free structure for your site

AboutHeader.title: About the studio
AboutHeader.description1: Our team of experienced specialists works on creating selling and functional web solutions for various clients
AboutHeader.description2: We ensure full transparency at all stages of work, so you can be confident that your project is in good hands
AboutHeader.description3: We ensure full transparency at all stages of work, so you can be confident that your project is in good hands

AboutInfo.description1: We thoroughly study the needs of each client and create unique solutions that meet their specific tasks and goals
AboutInfo.description2: We are not afraid to experiment and offer non-standard solutions to help you stand out in the market and achieve your goals
AboutInfo.description3: We are ready to quickly respond to market changes and adapt to new requirements to ensure the successful development of your project

AboutTeam.title: Team
AboutTeam.description1: We are a provider of high-quality, profitable, and selling solutions. Our team includes experienced copywriters, designers, developers, and marketers, SEO specialists.
AboutTeam.description2: We value our reputation and ensure full transparency at all stages of work, so you can be confident that your project is in good hands.

Metadata.title1: Web Design Agency TIPS - Creating High-Converting Websites for Business Growth
Metadata.titleOpenGraph1: TIPS Web Studio - Creation and promotion of selling websites
Metadata.description1: Webstudio TIPS is a leading web design agency that specializes in creating effective, sales-driving websites for businesses looking to expand internationally. Our team of marketing-savvy designers and developers work closely with clients to build custom websites tailored to their unique goals and target audiences
Metadata.descriptionOpenGraph1: TIPS Web Studio offers services in website development and promotion. We develop turnkey lendings, online stores and corporate websites. We carry out SEO-optimization and contextual advertising.
